DOC.brief_summary: This open label , phase 1 , `` 3+3 '' dose escalate study tolerability , safety , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics immunogenicity single subcutaneous injection novel monoclonal antibody interleukin-6 receptor - BCD-089 . The study enroll 19 healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: First-in-human Study Evaluate Safety , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Various Doses BCD-089 Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: IL-6 new potential therapeutic target play important role pathogenesis several autoimmune disorder include rheumatoid arthritis . BCD-089 novel fully human monoclonal antibody interleukin-6 receptor develop JCS BIOCAD ( Russia ) first step clinical evaluation . BCD-089-1 study first-in-human clinical trial intend evaluate tolerability , safety , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics immunogenicity BCD-089 use single step-by-step escalate subcutaneous dose healthy male volunteer . During study expect determine diapason safety dose BCD-089 ( incl . MTD ) thereafter evaluate phase 2 study .
